feed.title: ShinyTracker
feed.subtitle: Lists and displays detected changes on the RSI "Progress Tracker"

entry.title: Progress Tracker Delta - 2025-04-09
entry.summary: Progress Tracker Delta 569 deliverables listed | 2025-02-26 => 2025-04-09 There were 0 modifications, 0 removals, and 1 additions in this update. Please note that not all removals are intentional; there is currently a bug with how time is entered on the Progress Tracker that can cause deliverables to disappear.

entry.title: Scheduled Deliverables - 2025-04-09
entry.summary: There are currently 1 scheduled deliverables being worked on by 1 teams
